name: individual
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: individual
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a single person or thing, especially when compared to the group or set to which they belong

example.eg: Every individual has rights which must never be taken away.
example.egtrans: 每个人都有一些不可剥夺的权利。

example.eg: Like many creative individuals, she can be very bad-tempered.
example.egtrans: 像许多富有创造力的人一样，她的脾气有时会很不好。

example.eg: We try to treat our students as individuals.
example.egtrans: 我们力图把学生当成独立的个体来对待。

dsense.name: individual
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a person who thinks or behaves in their own original way
trans_examp.trans_cn: （思想或行为）与众不同的人，有个性的人

example.eg: If nothing else, the school will turn her into an individual.
example.egtrans: 即使不能有其他建树，这所学校至少会将她培养成为一个有其独特气质的人。

name: individual
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: individual
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: existing and considered separately from the other things or people in a group

example.eg: Each individual table is finished by hand.
example.egtrans: 每一张桌子都是手工做成的。

trans_examp.trans_en: given to or relating to a single, separate person or thing

example.eg: We deal with each case on an individual basis.
example.egtrans: 我们单独处理每个病例。

dsense.name: individual
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: belonging or relating to, or suitable for, people or things that are different or particular in some way

example.eg: Marion has a very individual writing style.
example.egtrans: 玛丽昂的写作风格与众不同。
